sections.title: Pay Bills
sections.description: Pay nearly anyone using direct online payments from your accounts. One-time or recurring, electronically or by mail.

sections.title: Transfer Money
sections.description: Move money between your BXFinance accounts, with the high-level assurance of transaction approvals pushed to your mobile app.

sections.title: Wire Money
sections.description: Send money to recipients around the world, domestically or internationally. It’s an instant way to get cash just about anywhere.

sections.title: Payment Activity
sections.description: Set, edit, and monitor your payments through any of your BXFinance accounts.

sections.title: Fastpay with Zelle
sections.description: Fastpay makes it easy to send and receive money from anyone—no matter where they bank in the U.S.
